roleset.name: to proclaim or advocate
roleset.note: PREACH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'preach' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from preach.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: transitive
example.text: Others preach the gospel of [*] buying only blue-chip growth stocks .
example.arg: the gospel of [*] buying only blue-chip growth stocks

example.name: preach about
example.text: Part of the problem is the tendency [*ICH*-1] of [all sitcoms]-1 , ever since the didactic days of Norman Lear , [*]-1 to preach about social issues .
